tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_data (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  sale_date DATE,
  sale_amount DECIMAL,
  target_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    product_id INT,
    quantity_sold INT,
    total_sales DECIMAL
);
